abilities.desc: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 5 times.
abilities.name: Poison Attack

abilities.desc: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.
abilities.name: Nethertoxin

abilities.desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.
abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other magic damage resistance sources.

abilities.desc: Viper slams into the ground, disarming each enemy in a 500 AoE for 4 seconds and splattering everyone in a 1200 AoE with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
abilities.name: Nosedive
abilities.notes: Cannot be used while Leashed or Rooted.

abilities.desc: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
abilities.name: Viper Strike
